name: Space Shooter (itch) (aayushh)
description:
This is my 2D shooter project.

Modifications are : 

1)Thrust Sprite 

2)Enemy Spawner

3)Environment modifications  (eg Planets and Nebulas)

4)Destructible environment 

5) Bonus points (enemy)

6) Final Boss

7) Short Storyline   

Credits:-

Created by Aayush

Assets were provided by Michigan State University
